source.3cf0f172: Use the `world` and `world_loans` GeoDataFrames to visualize Kiva loan locations across the world.
source.3cc378cd:
### 3) Select loans based in the Philippines.

Next, you'll focus on loans that are based in the Philippines.  Use the next code cell to create a GeoDataFrame `PHL_loans` which contains all rows from `world_loans` with loans that are based in the Philippines.
source.088d80bd:
# Introduction [Kiva.org](https://www.kiva.org/) is an online crowdfunding platform extending financial services to poor people around the world. Kiva lenders have provided over $1 billion dollars in loans to over 2 million people.

Kiva reaches some of the most remote places in the world through their global network of "Field Partners". These partners are local organizations working in communities to vet borrowers, provide services, and administer loans. In this exercise, you'll investigate Kiva loans in the Philippines. Can you identify regions that might be outside of Kiva's current network, in order to identify opportunities for recruiting new Field Partners? To get started, run the code cell below to set up our feedback system.

You might find [this map](https://bit.ly/2U2G7x7) useful to answer the question.
